channel.title: Emerging Technologies & Research on Proftsec
channel.description: Recent content in Emerging Technologies & Research on Proftsec

item.title: AI & ML for Threat Detection Lab
item.description: Build and test anomaly detection models using Python and machine learning libraries to identify cybersecurity threats in log data.

item.title: Blockchain Security & Smart Contract Exploitation Lab
item.description: Deploy vulnerable smart contracts and simulate real-world exploits using Ethereum tools like Remix IDE and Hardhat.

item.title: Zero Trust Architecture Lab
item.description: Implement a simulated Zero Trust environment using pfSense, Docker, and VPN tools to model identity-aware access and traffic segmentation.

item.title: Post-Quantum Cryptography Lab Instructions
item.description: Implement and analyze post-quantum encryption and signature schemes using Kyber and Dilithium.
